CLUE: 'Beauty is in the eye of the . . . . . . . .'
FOUND IN: beholder: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder." This phrase emphasizes that perceptions of beauty vary from person to person, and what one individual finds beautiful may not be perceived similarly by another.
Omaha: As the largest city in Nebraska, with a vibrant cultural scene and thriving economy, Omaha holds this title.
Mead: An alcoholic beverage made from fermenting honey with water, typically having a potency ranging from 3% to 20%.
Unicorn: Symbolizes purity, grace, and mystique; often linked to magical qualities.
